merpi_desc: %USER's fangs! Big or small you're very sure they'd hurt if they sank into your bits, but maybe that's the plan?

merpi_normal: %USER sinks their fangs into %TARGET's %T_PART like its the Discovery Channel!
merpi_flowery: %USER doesn't see the Discovery Channel camera man and host in the background as they sink their fangs down into %TARGET's %T_PART like a wild animal seeking a meal!
%USER bites into %TARGET's %T_PART gently, scraping their teeth playfully along the %T_PART as they do so.
%USER sinks their teeth playfully into %TARGET's %T_PART, squeezing at the %T_PART in a gentle and playful manner!
%USER nyomfs into %TARGET's %T_PART like it's a steak that belongs to them!

merpi_normal: %USER growls around their fangs as they sink into %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER can't help but animalistically growl around the fants they have stuck in %TARGET's %T_PART!

merpi_normal: %USER draws a little bit of blood from %TARGET's %T_PART with their fangs!
merpi_flowery: %USER presses their teeth in just a little too hard for the skin on %TARGET's %T_PART, drawing a very small drop of blood from their tips!
merpi_repeat: %USER bites %TARGET's %T_PART just a little too hard!

merpi_flowery: %USER shakes %TARGET's %T_PART like a polaroid picture, yanking it too and fro like a wild animal!

merpi_normal: %USER fully sinks their teeth into the flesh of %TARGET's %T_PART, ow!
merpi_flowery: %USER bares their fangs in full before sinking them directly into %TARGET's %T_PART, they've definitely broken the skin at this point and they don't seem super willing to release their hold!

%USER growls loudly as they bare their fangs and sink them directly into %TARGET's %T_PART.  The look in their eyes screams defiance as they do so, drawing blood from the bitemark as they hold on like a beartrap!
